content: little love baby blanket is a free fun and cute filet crochet pattern this is a simple and modern baby blanket crochet pattern **paid pdf version ** multiples and helpful tips are included in this pattern to help you make this blanket in to bigger sizes finished size width 28 inches x length 36 inches yarn paintbox yarns simply dk 1208 yards hook size 4mm / us g/6 and 5mm / us h/8 type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms delivery instant pdf download shop download crochet languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern
